text: General Guido Vildoso Calderón (born 5 April 1937) is a Bolivian politician. He was the de facto President of Bolivia from July 1982 to October 1982.Prado Salmón, Gral. Gary. "Poder y Fuerzas Armadas, 1949-1982. ==Notes== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Bolivia
title: Guido Vildoso
